overview: Jung-min wants to live with her lover, Hyuk-ju, but her mother Joo-hee is against it.  Hyeok-ju goes to Joo-hee's house and she says that she will try to convince her.  Joo-hee falls in love with her Hyeok-joo, and she wants to have her, so he allows her to live together.  In the end, Jung-min and Hyuk-joo end up living together. Joo-hee aims for Hoshi-tam-tam-hyuk-joo.
title: Mother-in-law: second wife
